name: THE Asia Universities Summit 2025 | Macau | 22-24 April
content: Join leading experts and top influential speakers from the region and beyond as we gather to participate in a diverse array of discussions, debates, and conversations surrounding Asia's dynamic innovation ecosystem, as a result of recent economic growth. As well as celebrating Asia's achievements, the summit will acknowledge the challenges ahead, advocating for the ethical use of emerging technologies, investment in science education and infrastructure, and the promotion of inclusivity in the scientific community. The event will feature the exclusive reveal of the THE World University Rankings Asia 2025, as well as celebrate the triumphs and accomplishments of universities in the region at THE Awards Asia 2025 winners ceremony. Interested in partnering with THE? Get in touch with the team partner@timeshighereducation.com to find out more about our partnership opportunities to help elevate your brand. URL: Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/2555795-0?pid=4868 Date and Time: On Tuesday April 22, 2025 at 9:00 am to Thursday April 24, 2025 at 5:00 pm Venue details: Macau University of Science and Technology, Avenida Wai Long, Taipa, Macao, Macau Category: Conferences | Education | Higher Education Price: Universities: USD 499.00
